text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Got you! You have the right to remain
silent. Anything you say can and will be
used against you.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Hehee, I have a message from Air Groove.
"I'm sure you can finish your work
quickly, so stop putting it off and just
do it right away".

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I refuse. First off, I heard Rudolf say 
that we can still extend the deadline.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
And second, the sooner I finish, the
more work they'll pile on me. There's no
merit to doing it immediately.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I see! Then why don't I add some merit?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
If you finish your work quickly, I'll
give you a reward♪ What would you like?
A meat exchange voucher maybe?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Stop. Don't go off on your own. 
I didn't say a dang thing about doing ——

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
What about an "eat some of my
vegetables" or "join me for running
practice" one? Perhaps a get out of jail
free card? You can have any of these,
you know?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Hehee. So how about it? Why don't you
try finishing today's work for now?
